day.description: Represents the specific day associated with the interval.
day.description_zh: 表示与间隔关联的特定日期。

:day-index.description: Index of the day this interval is a part of, in a week or month view.
:day-index.description_zh: 此间隔所属的日期的索引，在周或月视图中。

disabled.description: Removes the ability to click or target the component.
disabled.description_zh: 删除单击组件或定位组件的功能。

display-value.description: Value to display for the component, possibly a formatted date.
display-value.description_zh: 要为组件显示的值，可能是格式化的日期。

events.description: Array of events specific to this interval.
events.description_zh: 特定于此间隔的事件数组。

first-day-of-week.description_zh: 缺少描述（在 github 中编辑）

hide-day-header.description: Determines whether the day header is visible in the calendar day view.
hide-day-header.description_zh: 确定日标题在日历日视图中是否可见。

hide-header.description: Determines whether the header is hidden in the calendar view.
hide-header.description_zh: 确定标题是否在日历视图中隐藏。

hide-week-number.description: Toggles the display of week numbers in a calendar view.
hide-week-number.description_zh: 切换日历视图中周数的显示。

:interval-divisions.description: Number of subdivisions within this interval.

:interval-duration.description: Duration of this specific interval in minutes.
:interval-duration.description_zh: 此特定间隔的持续时间（以分钟为单位）。

interval-format.description: Formatting rule for displaying the interval, as a string or function.
interval-format.description_zh: 用于将间隔显示为字符串或函数的格式设置规则。

:interval-height.description: Height of the interval in pixels in the calendar view.
:interval-height.description_zh: 日历视图中的间隔高度（以像素为单位）。

:intervals.description: Total number of intervals in a day view.

:interval-start.description: Starting time for this specific interval.
:interval-start.description_zh: 此特定间隔的开始时间。

max.description: Maximum date or value that can be selected.
max.description_zh: 可以选择的最大日期或值。

min.description: Minimum date or value that can be selected.
min.description_zh: 可以选择的最小日期或值。

v-model.description: The v-model value of the component. If component supports the multiple prop, this defaults to an empty array.
v-model.description_zh: 组件的 v-model 值。如果 component 支持 multiple prop，则默认为空数组。

month.description: Specifies the month for the calendar view.

next-icon.description: The icon to use for the next button.
next-icon.description_zh: 用于 Next （下一步） 按钮的图标。

prev-icon.description: The icon to use for the prev button.
prev-icon.description_zh: 用于 prev 按钮的图标。

show-adjacent-months.description: Shows or hides days from adjacent months.
show-adjacent-months.description_zh: 显示或隐藏相邻月份的日期。

text.description: Specify content text for the component.

title.description: Specify a title text for the component.

view-mode.description: The current view mode of the calendar.

weekdays.description: Specifies which days of the week to display.

weeks-in-month.description: A dynamic number of weeks in a month will grow and shrink depending on how many days are in the month. A static number always shows 7 weeks.
weeks-in-month.description_zh: 一个月中的动态周数将根据该月的天数而增加和减少。静态数字始终显示 7 周。

year.description: Specifies the year for the calendar view.

events.name: next
events.description: Emitted when moving to the next time period.
events.description_zh: 移动到下一个时间段时发出。

events.name: prev
events.description: Emitted when moving to the previous time period.
events.description_zh: 移动到上一个时间段时发出。

events.name: update:modelValue
events.description: Event that is emitted when the component’s model changes.
events.description_zh: 组件的模型更改时发出的事件。

slots.name: event
slots.description_zh: 缺少描述（在 github 中编辑）
slots.params: { day: Object; allDay: boolean; event: Record<string, unknown> }

slots.name: header
slots.description_zh: 自定义标题内容的插槽。

exposed.name: daysInMonth
exposed.description: Provides data about the days in the selected month.
exposed.description_zh: Provides data about the days in the selected month.
exposed.detail:
{
  date: unknown
  isoDate: string
  formatted: string
  year: number
  month: number
  isDisabled: boolean
  isWeekStart: boolean
  isWeekEnd: boolean
  isToday: boolean
  isAdjacent: boolean
  isHidden: boolean
  isStart: boolean
  isSelected: boolean
  isEnd: boolean
  isSame: boolean
  localized: string
}[]

exposed.name: daysInWeek
exposed.description: Provides data about the days in the selected week.
exposed.description_zh: Provides data about the days in the selected week.
exposed.detail:
{
  date: unknown
  isoDate: string
  formatted: string
  year: number
  month: number
  isDisabled: boolean
  isWeekStart: boolean
  isWeekEnd: boolean
  isToday: boolean
  isAdjacent: boolean
  isHidden: boolean
  isStart: boolean
  isSelected: boolean
  isEnd: boolean
  isSame: boolean
  localized: string
}[]

exposed.name: genDays
exposed.description: Generates day objects based on provided dates.
exposed.description_zh: Generates day objects based on provided dates.
exposed.detail:
(
  days: unknown[],
  today: unknown,
) => {
  date: unknown
  isoDate: string
  formatted: string
  year: number
  month: number
  isDisabled: boolean
  isWeekStart: boolean
  isWeekEnd: boolean
  isToday: boolean
  isAdjacent: boolean
  isHidden: boolean
  isStart: boolean
  isSelected: boolean
  isEnd: boolean
  isSame: boolean
  localized: string
}[]
